verbose_text: Furthermore, luciferase reporter assays confirmed that miR-490-5p suppressed the BMPR2 3'UTR luciferase activity by 40%, and the luciferase activity was completely reversed following transfection with mutated BMPR2 3'UTR (XREF_FIG).
evidence: luciferase reporter assays confirmed that miR-490-5p suppressed the BMPR2
